name: Doortal
description:
Doortal is a puzzle game that bends reality. What is on the other side of a door depends on what shape you put in. Can you collect all the shapes? Can you visit all the dimensions? How fast can you do it? Good Luck! Have Fun!

If you're struggling, visit www.ryfi.games/doortal for a walkthrough guide!

Ryfi Games: www.ryfigames.com

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqiYPTpEasGBRmArBKRLy6w

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/william-van-bremmet

Made for GeoJam with the theme "The Other Side"

THERE IS A WEB VERSION OF THIS GAME but downloading is the best for performance.
